<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.PasswordPolicyDefaults</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>PasswordPolicyDefaults</name> <script><![CDATA[var PasswordPolicyDefaults = { default_defaults: { 'minimum_uppercase_characters': '1', 'minimum_lowercase_characters': '1', 'minimum_numeric_characters': '1', 'minimum_special_characters': '0' },
default_strong_defaults: { 'minimum_uppercase_characters': '1', 'minimum_lowercase_characters': '1', 'minimum_numeric_characters': '1', 'minimum_special_characters': '1' }, medium_defaults: { 'minimum_uppercase_characters': '1', 'minimum_lowercase_characters': '1', 'minimum_numeric_characters': '1', 'minimum_special_characters': '1' }, high_defaults: { 'minimum_uppercase_characters': '1', 'minimum_lowercase_characters': '2', 'minimum_numeric_characters': '1', 'minimum_special_characters': '3' } };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-08-13 08:32:16</sys_created_on> <sys_id>42de436c531333009e33ddeeff7b12a7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>PasswordPolicyDefaults</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Password Policy" source="com.glide.password_policy">67fd380f6d2220100acb70b353433030</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_42de436c531333009e33ddeeff7b12a7</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-07-29 10:15:06</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>858</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
